remarks: A finer filter produces a finer image filter.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 16-Nov-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
statement: fmss $p |- ( ( ( X e. A /\ B e. ( fBas ` Y ) /\ C e. ( fBas ` Y ) ) /\ ( F : Y --> X /\ B C_ C ) ) -> ( ( X FilMap F ) ` B ) C_ ( ( X FilMap F ) ` C ) ) $.
